title: How to Install Ring Video Doorbell
description:
Ring Video Doorbell features a motion-activated HD camera and two-way talk technology to allow homeowners to see, hear and speak to visitors from a smartphone, tablet or desktop.

Ring Video Doorbell comes with a free toolkit and step-by-step instructions to help you set up your device in minutes.

asset.title: How to Install Ring Video Doorbell
asset.description:
Ring Video Doorbell features a motion-activated HD camera and two-way talk technology to allow homeowners to see, hear and speak to visitors from a smartphone, tablet or desktop.

Ring Video Doorbell comes with a free toolkit and step-by-step instructions to help you set up your device in minutes. This is a quick overview of the installation process, but for more detailed instructions, see this video: http://bit.ly/28ONaPt. 

If you run into any issues or have questions, contact Ring Community Support at 800.656.1918 or help@ring.com for additional assistance.
